name: @snoka/monorepo
description: A fast and fun test runner for Vite & Node Powered by Vite.
author: Elone Hoo <hi@elonehoo.me>

scripts.watch: pnpm run build && pnpm run --parallel --filter "./packages/**" -r watch
scripts.release: bumpp package.json packages/*/package.json --commit --push --tag && pnpm -r publish --access public
